about_the_game:
Criminals are heroes and justice is evil.
You are the latest hope for this crumbling world.
This game combines rhythm and tower defense.
Choose your way to defuse the waves of looters while keeping the store safe.

STORY


In a world where politics panders to the masses,
crime became too easy and justice became impossible.
Policing, once a human endeavor, now exceeds mortal capacity.
This is where you come in.
As a new form of artificial intelligence,
you control a plaza security robot—a guardian of the night.
You are equipped with a stun baton and a hand gun,
to protect the East parking lot of this plaza, where BB's Classical Music store is located.

BB is a hard working human trying to keep her store alive.
She has dreams of spreading her love of classical music to her neighborhood.
But things have shifted. A sudden trend of hate against classical music has emerged online.
Some people have claimed that classical music is biased, prejudiced and frankly just BAD!

Classical music is now a political problem, and tonight that problem is reaching a boiling point.
As BB closes the store as usual, something just doesn't feel right.
Lurking in the dark, vile creatures emerge.
They claim to be fighting for justice and unity.
As they lurk closer, their true intentions become known.
Your objective is clear, PROTECT THE STORE.

GAMEPLAY


Looters are trying to break into BB's Classical Music store for some easy cash;
your job is to stop them.
You have a gun, a baton, and your fist!
It is advised to use appropriate force to defeat the looters (gun > baton > fist).
Using excessive force will cause looters to rush at you,
and using less force than the looters will cause damage to you.
This game has a heavy focus on combo and time management.
Looters also drop loots, sometimes items and other times upgrades.
As the game progresses, the difficulty will climb but so will your upgrades and skill level!

GAME OBJECTIVE


Keep the store safe, and stay alive.

content_descriptors.notes:
Example of mature content in this game:
1. Pixel-art style characters harmed via ,knock out, gun shot, explosion or burned.
2.Depiction of crime via looters looting stores.

name: Plaza Security #neverforget7/13

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 Max-Q
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: #neverforget7/13 This game is a blend of 4 line rhythm mechanics and tower defense. You are a plaza security guard trying to defend waves of looters. As you go further you begin to discover some interesting events.
